pullrequest.title: Add ArrangePlugin to arrange models for tasks

content.raw: This is really nice. We could call the plugin `arrange_plugin`. With that name, `initialTask` would become `initial_arrangement`, and each `task` would be `arrangement`. Might want to rename `modelName` to `model_name` to be more like SDF. The `name` attribute for each `<pose>` could be `model` for better clarity.
content.html: This is really nice. We could call the plugin arrange_plugin. With that name, initialTask would become initial_arrangement, and each task would be arrangement. Might want to rename modelName to model_name to be more like SDF. The name attribute for each <pose> could be model for better clarity.
